metadata.title: CVE-2019-12221 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in libSDL2.a in Simple DirectMedia Layer (SDL)2.0.9 when used in conjunction with libSDL2_image.a in SDL2_image 2.0.4.There is a SEGV in the SDL function SDL_free_REAL at stdlib/SDL_malloc.c.

criterions.comment: libsdl2-image: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
sdl-image1.2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
